text_elements.text:
Problem Statement & Motivation
Critical Challenges in Current LLM Deployment

High Computational Costs
High cost of specialized GPUs
Prohibitive for many SMEs
Expensive infrastructure

Data Privacy Constraints
Strict compliance needs (GDPR/CCPA)
Restrictions on cloud-based LLMs
On-premises solutions essential

Resource Limitations
Deployment on single-GPU workstations
Limited access to high-performance hardware
Practical deployment constraints

Performance Gap
SLMs (~8B params) suffer accuracy degradation
Trade-off between model size and quality
Need for efficiency without sacrificing performance

The Challenge
8B
Parameter SLMs
Accessible but limited accuracy

vs
70B+
Parameter LLMs
High accuracy, prohibitive costs

Organizations face high costs, strict privacy rules, and limited hardware. 
Smaller models are accessible but often lack the required accuracy.
How can we boost SLM accuracy within tight resource and privacy constraints?
Adaptive Query-Routing Framework for Optimizing Small Language Models
